readable.title: 2391812384_7429b5e567
readable.content: A child dressed in purple clothing and a hat runs in splashing water while a man and a small boy walk nearby . A child wearing purple runs through splashing water while a man in red looks on . A family playing the spray of a fountain . A man and two toddlers get sprinkled as they pass an ornamental fountain . a young girl wearing purple running through water
